# Test-IsAdmin

## SYNOPSIS
Tests if the user is an administrator

## SYNTAX

### Set 1
```
Test-IsAdmin
```

## DESCRIPTION
Returns true if a user is an administrator, false if the user is not an administrator

## EXAMPLES

### PS C:\\\>Test-IsAdmin

```powershell
C:\PS> Test-IsAdmin
```

## PARAMETERS

## INPUTS

### None


## OUTPUTS

### System.Boolean
